sections.title: Introduction
sections.content:
Note: **This article or section is a candidate for moving to Category:Appearance.** This article or section is a candidate for moving to Category:Appearance.

This article or section is a candidate for moving to Category:Appearance.

Eye candy (also known as "ricing") enhances the visual experience, and in some cases, may also increase functionality of software. If you have the time, consider modifying the output and appearance of the software you most frequently use.
